ARABIC: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِى ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ قُلْ سَأَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْهُ ذِكْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will ask you about Dhu'l-Qarnayn. Say: 'I will tell you something about him.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad), they ask you about Dhu al-Qarnayn. Say: "I will give you an account of him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), they will ask you about Dhu 'l-Qarnayn. Say, "I shall tell you something about him".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they ask you regarding Zul-Qarnain; say, “I shall recite his story to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they ask you about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say: "I shall recite to you something of his story."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they ask you about Zulqarnain. Say: I will recite to you an account of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They will question thee concerning Dhool Karnain. Say: 'I will recite to you a mention of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will ask thee of Dhu'l-Qarneyn. Say: I shall recite unto you a remembrance of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will ask you about Dhu'l-Qarnayn. Say, "I will give you an account of him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they ask thee of Zul Qarnain. Say thou: shall recite unto you of him some mention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They question you concerning Dhul Qarnayn. Say, ‘I will relate to you an account of him.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They ask thee concerning Zul-qarnain. Say, "I will rehearse to you something of his story."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they ask you about Dhul-Qarnain. Say: "I shall recite to you something of his story."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will ask you about ThulKarnain (the pious and chosen). Say: 'I will recite to you something of his story.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they ask you about Zul-Qarnain. Say, “I will tell you something about him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say, "I will recite to you about him a report."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:83] And they, the Jews, question you concerning Dhū’l-Qarnayn, whose name was Alexander; he was not a prophet. Say: ‘I shall recite, relate, to you a mention, an account, of him’, of his affair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They) the people of Mecca (will ask thee) Muhammad (of Dhu'l-Qarnayn) about the event of Dhu'l- Qarnayn. (Say) to them, Muhammad: (I shall recite unto you a remembrance of him) I shall recite to you an explanation of his event.
